data.text:
So in ending this i hope @PlayStation and @CDPROJEKTRED @CyberpunkGame see this and i hope to see #Cyberpunk2077 back on the store soon...i dnt have a #ps5 so my ps4 will have to do so please @PlayStation bring back #Cyberpunk2077 

Sincerely,
Angry concerned Gamer.
